name: MintyRPG Gameplay Demo
description:
Your goal is to kill all enemies, while having none of your allies die.

This demo has no beginning or end, nor a fail or winstate. Just raw turns being played out. 

EDIT1:

Just some extra clarifications:

The arrows on the floor show the next character the character it's pointing from will attack.

The orangish claw mark means the damage the character will do with the number after it. A purple skull underneath means the attack is poisonous. If there's a purple bubbles icon above a hp-bar: the character's poisoned.

Also, for downloading: extract all three files from the .zip to a single map, then doubleclick the .exe file to play.

Tell me what you think of the mechanics if you happen to play it in the comments.
